column5: The Department of Electrical, Computer & Energy Engineering (ECEE) offers degree options tailored to both working engineers looking to advance their careers and to those looking to pursue a career in academia. Research is concentrated in six broad areas:optics, nanostructures and bioengineeringcommunications and signal processingcomputer engineeringsystems and controlselectromagnetics, RF and microwavespower electronicsFor more information, visit the department's Prospective Students webpage.
